summary: This is an email from a Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, requesting a follow-up call with an unspecified recipient. It indicates ongoing coordination within the prosecution team regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: Deputy Chief, Public Corruption Unit
persons.context: The sender of the email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, requesting a follow-up call with the recipient.

events.title: Follow-up Call Request
events.description: A Deputy Chief from the Public Corruption Unit requests a follow-up call with an unspecified recipient, indicating ongoing case coordination.

keyFacts: The email is dated January 6, 2021, showing post-conviction activity related to the Epstein case.
The communication originates from the Public Corruption Unit of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates internal team coordination, with the sender acting on the team's suggestion to arrange a call.
